question: Which state government has launched the ‘Nadu-Nedu’ programme?
explanation: The Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister Y S Jaganmohan Reddy has launched the \'Nadu-Nedu\' programme to introduce English medium from classes 1 to 6 in state-run schools.The scheme will be implemented in 15,715 schools in the first phase. It will cover all schools in three years\' time with a budget of Rs 12,000 crores.
